    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_563b258d496178034b792c8a28ce891efbdca9fa</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Gas and pressure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gas und Druck</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gaz et pression</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gás e pressão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gas e pressione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αέριο και πίεση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gas y presión</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a gas being squeezed into a smaller space by applying pressure. Gas density decreases when gas molecules occupy a smaller volume.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">space</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">volume</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Gas, das in einen 
kleineren Platz zusammengedrückt wird, indem sie Druck anwendet. 
Gasdichte verringert sich, wenn Gasmoleküle einen kleineren 
Datenträger besetzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un gaz étant serré 
dans un plus petit espace en appliquant la pression. La densité
de gaz diminue quand les molécules de gaz occupent un plus petit 
volume.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um gás que está sendo 
espremido em um espaço menor aplicando a pressão. A densidade 
do gás diminui quando as moléculas do gás ocupam um volume menor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un gas che è 
compresso in un più piccolo spazio applicando la pressione. La 
densità del gas diminuisce quando le molecole del gas occupano un 
più piccolo volume.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει που συμπιέζεται αέριο
σε ένα μικρότερο διάστημα με τη "Εφαρμογή" της πίεσης. 
Αέριο η πυκνότητα μειώνεται όταν αέριο 
καταλαμβάνουν τα μόρια μια μικρότερη ένταση του ήχου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un gas que es exprimido
en un espacio más pequeño aplicando la presión. La densidad 
del gas disminuye cuando las moléculas del gas ocupan un volumen más
pequeño.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Platz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Datenträger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Moleküle</string>
          </keyword>
